name: StreetSoundsRadio
0:
”Alexa play Street Sounds Radio”
”Alexa start Street Sounds Radio”
”Alexa open Street Sounds Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: street sounds radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Music that explores the very DNA of the Street Sounds era; the epitome of pure quality and absolute authenticity.

38 YEARS IN THE MAKING…MORE MUSIC, FULL LENGTH, FULL ‘PHAT’ VERSIONS, LESS ADS.

Daytime (7.00am-7.00pm): A aural feast of the greatest music of black origin from the 70s, 80s, 90s & let’s not forget, there are also some great sounds from the noughties & twenty-tens.
Evening (7.00pm-1.00am) & Weekends: Specialist shows.
Night (1.00am-7.00am): Taking our listeners through the night to the early hours of the morning, the most soulful collection of slow jams.

Enable the skill and then ask you Alexa device to "play Street Sounds Radio" to tune in.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
